types.name: User
types.description: A user is a logged in user.

types.name: Book
types.description: A book is a book on Goodreads.

types.name: Link
types.description: A link is a link I have save on pinboard or a link in a post.

types.name: Log
types.description: A Log is a journal entry by an individual.

types.name: Float
types.description: The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by [IEEE 754](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

types.name: Time
types.description: Time is a datetime scalar with timezone.

types.name: Duration
types.description: Duration is float of seconds that something took.

types.name: Geo
types.description: Geo is a simple type for wrapping a point.

types.name: Query
types.description: The query type, represents all of the entry points into our object graph.

fields.name: books
fields.description: Returns some books.

fields.name: links
fields.description: Returns a subset of all links ever, in reverse chronological order, using provided limit and offset.

fields.name: link
fields.description: Returns a single link by id or url.

fields.name: stats
fields.description: Returns a number of stats, ordered by most recently updated.

fields.name: counts
fields.description: Returns counts of entries in the database.

fields.name: whoami
fields.description: If logged in, returns a user.

fields.name: tweets
fields.description: Returns tweets in database.

fields.name: tweet
fields.description: Returns just one tweet.

fields.name: tweetsByScreenName
fields.description: Returns a user's tweets by screen name.

fields.name: time
fields.description: The current server time.

fields.name: drafts
fields.description: Returns an array of inprogress posts.

fields.name: futurePosts
fields.description: Returns an array of unpublished posts.

fields.name: posts
fields.description: Returns an array of all posts, ordered by reverse chronological order, using provided limit and offset.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Returns most recent comments for all published posts.

fields.name: search
fields.description: Returns a selection of posts that match the search.

fields.name: post
fields.description: Returns a single post by ID.

fields.name: nextPost
fields.description: Returns post id for the next post chronologically.

fields.name: prevPost
fields.description: Returns post id for the previous post chronologically.

fields.name: postsByTag
fields.description: Returns all posts that contain a tag.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: Returns all tags used in a post.

fields.name: logs
fields.description: Returns all Logs for your user.

fields.name: log
fields.description: Returns a log based on an ID.

fields.name: photos
fields.description: Returns all photos for your user.

types.name: String
types.description: The `String`scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: ID
types.description: The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as "4") or integer (such as 4) input value will be accepted as an ID.

types.name: Comment
types.description: Comment is a comment on a post.

fields.name: uri
fields.description: uri returns an absolute link to this comment.

types.name: Post
types.description: A post is an individual post in the blog.

fields.name: datetime
fields.description: datetime is the published time of an article.

fields.name: links
fields.description: links are the links referenced in a post.

fields.name: uri
fields.description: uri returns an absolute link to this post.

fields.name: related
fields.description: A list of related posts. Maximum returned will be 10.

types.name: Stat
types.description: A stat is a key value pair of two interesting strings.

types.name: URI
types.description: A URI is a url or url like thing.

types.name: Tweet
types.description: A Tweet is an archived tweet.

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: The @deprecated directive is used within the type system definition language to indicate deprecated portions of a GraphQL services schema, such as deprecated fields on a type or deprecated enum values.

directives.name: include
directives.description: The @include directive may be provided for fields, fragment spreads, and inline fragments, and allows for conditional inclusion during execution as described by the if argument.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: The @skip directive may be provided for fields, fragment spreads, and inline fragments, and allows for conditional exclusion during execution as described by the if argument.
